title: Ep 84: Neil deGrasse Dyson
description:
In this Episode: CHOOSE YOUR OWN RICKVENTURE IS BACK. Ricky chose a story about a soldier not knowing what to do about his upcoming drug test, a guy who doesn't mind sleeping in a nest of clothes instead of a bed, a boyfriend who gives a bad haircut and then demands his payment, and a listener who doesn't always catch when people are being rude to them.  Christian also graces us with some entrepreneurial ideas to help increase our cash flow.
 
Get Judgies Merch Here
 
Our Patreon is officially open, if you want to see extra content go check it out!  
 
Send us mail! (Addressed However You'd Like)
P.O. Box 58 Ottawa, IL 61350  
 
Leave a Review!  
Follow us on Twitter
Follow us on Instagram
 
Intro Music by: Iván  
 
Story Links:
Solider with an Issue
